Name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
Title: Matsutake Meat Rolls
Desc: Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.

Talent.Name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
Talent.Desc: Heal the target character for 2 HP. For the next 3 Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again during the End Phase.\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
